Hey buddy!  You whine alot and you don't understand that if something is ma=
de legal or you get permission, then IT'S LEGAL AND YOU HAVE PERMISSION!  S=
HEESH!  Now, I know this is about Megaton's size, but that was the same wit=
h Necromancer!  And I made him long before you were here!  And Hell Drak al=
so transformed into a giant dragon!  Three giant dragons: Necromancer, Hell=
 Drak, and Megaton!  And I had permission for that!  And even though Necrom=
ancer and Hell Drak have changed, Megaton is still large, and Cyberwolf has=
 permission(I hope) to have Megaton go that large!  God!  Not every bot is =
equal you know, some bots are weaker and some are stronger!  You can't alwa=
ys have the super-powered bots!  Now, I don't want to be on bad terms with =
you or anything, LN, please don't take this personally.  I guess this kind =
of goes to everybody.  Oh, and I appologize greatly for wasting all you gre=
at RPers' precious time.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Legendaryn=
emasis@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, August 05, 20=
01 7:29 PM
  Subject: Re: After the pain. (OOC:)


  Just because four bots=
 rode him doesnt mean he got any bigger. Making your 
  bot grow to 80 feet=
 long is cheap and should be illegal. he could crush 
  someone, no matter =
if hes 80 feet long or tall. It simply isnt fair. And If I 
  use your reas=
oning I guess I can make Gemini Dragon grow to well over 125 
  feet tall s=
imply because its a gestalt and suddenly it can grow. And not 
  everything=
 that was legal before is legal now. Shooting weapons fire heading 
  at yo=
ur charachter was once legal and is now illegal. Seeking weapons were 
  on=
ce legal, now they aren't. 
  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Y=
ahoo! Terms of Service.
